product_name: Sea to Summit Big River Dry Bag - 3 Liters
long_description: Whether you like backpacking, adventure racing, trekking, boating or pack-rafting, you need to keep your gear dry and functioning. The Sea to Summit Big River dry bag was created with you in mind.
